title: Poster, 1997-19-227, 1972
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted in white across lower edge: Ettore Sottsass, Andrea Branzi, Michele De Lucchi, Massimo Iosa Ghini, Antonio Citterio, James Irvine, Davide Mercatali, Marco Zanuso Jr., Guido Borelli, Beppe Caturegli, Joanna Grawunder, Mike Ryan, Marco Susani
Imprinted in white lower right corner: PRINT/ABET LAMINATI
Imprinted in white right center: Coordinamento Mastra:SOTTSASS ASSOCIATI . FOTO: SANTI CALECA . Progetto Grafico: ZELIG . Stampa: L'ARTISTICA
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Photographic reproduction of an interior view of a designer's showroom area. Featured are brightly lit and colorfully designed wall screens and room dividers.  The arrangement is set on an irregular platform and surrounded by darkness. At upper left corner a white triangle jutts into the image with black letters "DIAFOS," and below "MATERIAL LIGHTS." Across lower edge of sheet from left to right  the names of the lighting/furniture designers featured.
